text: @kylegriffin1 Ya just can’t fix stupid. So the White House, that is supposed to have leaders working on behalf of the American people, are not smart enough to follow their own medical experts pandemic protocol. Our government will be the next covid-19 hot spot. You just can’t make this crap up
